text: The Otago cricket team, based at Dunedin in New Zealand, has been active since 1864. The team has first-class status, and competes in the Plunket Shield which they have won 13 times, most recently in 1987â€“88. Their home ground is the University of Otago Oval in Dunedin. The team is known as the Otago Volts in limited overs matches. Category:First-class cricket teams in New Zealand
title: Otago cricket team
